mapper.select: SELECT company_no, company_name FROM companies order by company_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Companies (company_no, company_name, dealer_phone, dealer_name, phone, address, ceo_name, bank_name, account_no, note ) VALUES( #{company_no}, #{company_name}, #{dealer_phone}, #{dealer_name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{ceo_name}, #{bank_name}, #{account_no}, #{note})
